data.scheme_name: Development/Upgradation of Watermills (WM) & setting up Micro Hydel Project (MHP) Scheme  - Existing
data.benefits: This scheme provides  incentive to State Nodal Agency (SNA) by CFA would be, an incentive of Rs.0.035 lakh per watermill in mechanical mode, Rs.0.10 lakh per WM in electrical/ electrical & mechanical mode, and 1% of the subsidy or a minimum of Rs.0.25 lakh for each MHP will be provided as service charges
data.eligibility: All Entrepreneurs want to setup Micro Hydel project and Development/upgradation of watermill are elligible under this scheme.
data.beneficiaries: All Entrepreneurs want to setup Micro Hydel project and Development/upgradation of watermill are elligible under this scheme.
data.nodal_agency: Ministry of New and Renewable Energy
data.context:
• The Watermills (WM) and Micro Hydel Projects (MHP) have the potential to meet the power requirements of remote areas in a decentralized manner. 
  • The scheme provides grant of Central Financial Assistance for development/ upgradation of WM and setting up of MHP. 
  • The scheme also envisages support for specialised studies/survey, strengthening of database, training and capacity building relating to WM and MHP.
data.objective: The Ministry of New and Renewable Energy (MNRE) is a vital government body in India, spearheading the development and deployment of renewable energy sources.
data.description: This scheme provides , Incentive to State Nodal Agency (SNA) by CFA would be, an incentive of Rs.3,500 per watermill in mechanical mode, Rs.10,000 per WM in electrical/ electrical & mechanical mode, and 1% of the subsidy or a minimum of Rs.25,000 for each MHP will be provided as service charges
data.how_to_apply: Candidates can apply through https://mnre.gov.in/notice-category/tenders/ ( Ministry of New & Renewable Energy)
data.funding_facilitator: Ministry of New and Renewable Energy
data.funding_mechanism: Applicants will get the funds after fulfillment of conditions under the scheme
data.website: Development/Upgradation of Watermills and setting up Micro Hydel Projects (up to 100 KW capacity)
data.checklist_info_a:
1. Udyam registrtaion certificate
2. Project report 
3. Application form
4. Two copies of the project report
5. Land Allotment Details
6. Techno-Economic Clearance
7.  Environmental Clearance
8. Water Rights
data.checklist_info_b: Tenders | Ministry of New and Renewable Energy | India (mnre.gov.in)
data.checklist_info_d: Address : Ministry of New and Renewable Energy (MNRE), Atal Akshaya Urja Bhawan, CGO Complex, Lodhi Road, New Delhi – 110003, India
data.beneficiary: All Industry  - All Entities  - All Location  - All MSMEs
